name: Loans; insurance and guarantees
text: §201G-199   [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  The administration may procure insurance or guarantees against any default of its loans, in amounts and from insurers or guarantors, as it deems necessary or desirable. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 196, §26(a)]
